comments.body:
As it stands in https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:Main there is no API chat interaction options.
Is there any chances that any kind of chat interactions would be added in the future?

Main idea is to create ingame translation tool for people with limited foreign language knowledge.
For example custom API overlay would duplicate chat in other chat window and translate it on the selected language as the chat goes.

Other handy feature would be transliteration tool for Cyrillic (since we have no support) like following services provide online:
http://www.lexilogos.com/keyboard/russian_conversion.htm
http://translit.cc/
Why? Well as native Russian I type rally fast both in Cyrillic and English… but really slow in Russian transliteration because I do not use it anywhere except Guild Wars 2. Witch is big clown fiesta when you try to communicate with fellow Russians.
